Class: Eraser

DrawerJs.plugins.Eraser(drawerInstance, options)

new Eraser(drawerInstance, options)

Provides an eraser which allows to erase any drawing/shapes.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
drawerInstance DrawerJs.Drawer Instance of DrawerJs.Drawer.
options Object Configuration object.
Properties
Name Type Description
brushSize number Eraser default brush size

After eraser path was created - apply it to all affected shapes.

Name Type Description
e fabric.Event
Source:
  • plugins/brush-eraser/Eraser.js, line 255

_onMouseDown(e)

Set erasingNow to true. Eraser path will start by current brush, independently.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
e Event mouse down event
Source:
  • plugins/brush-eraser/Eraser.js, line 338

_onMouseUp()

On mouse up - set erasingNow to false. Eraser path will be created soon, and main work on erasing will be done in _onEraserPathCreated()
Source:
  • plugins/brush-eraser/Eraser.js, line 355

_removeEraserCursorShape()

Remove eraser shape, that was used as eraser cursor
